body:
Hello,

I'm getting an error when installing any py-* package. It seems there are error with python core modules.

I'm on openSUSE 13.2 x86_64, 3.16.7-21-desktop and gcc version 4.9.2 (GCC).

Thank you very much,

[spack-build.out.txt](https://github.com/LLNL/spack/files/594300/spack-build.out.txt)
title: Error when installing any python package
